Package sd.assignment.backend.services

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
sd.assignment.backend.services.OrderService
@Service public class OrderService extends Object
This Service deals with methods specific to the `order` entity

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      public void createOrder(OrderDTO orderDTO) throws Exception
      Validates and creates a new order
      Parameters:
      orderDTO - Contains information about the user, the restaurant and the details of the order
      Throws:
      Exception - if any of the details are invalid, or if the DB couldn't be accessed

    • getOrdersByUsername

      public List<OrderDTO> getOrdersByUsername(String username) throws Exception
      Retrieved all orders of a specific user
      Parameters:
      username - the identification token of the user
      Returns:
      a list with his past orders
      Throws:
      Exception - if the username is invalid or the DB couldn't be accessed

    • getOrdersByRestaurant

      public List<OrderDTO> getOrdersByRestaurant(String restaurantId) throws Exception
      Retrieved all orders of a specific restaurant
      Parameters:
      restaurantId - the identification token of the restaurant
      Returns:
      a list with its past orders
      Throws:
      Exception - if the restaurant id is invalid or the DB couldn't be accessed

    • filterOrdersByStatusAndRestaurant

      public List<OrderDTO> filterOrdersByStatusAndRestaurant(String state, String restaurantId) throws Exception
      Retrieved all orders of a specific restaurant that have a specific status
      Parameters:
      state - the status it is searching for
      restaurantId - the identification token of the restaurant
      Returns:
      a list with its past orders with the given status
      Throws:
      Exception - if the restaurant id or status are invalid or the DB couldn't be accessed

    • changeOrderStatus

      public OrderDTO changeOrderStatus(OrderDTO orderDTO) throws Exception
      Change the status of a given order
      Parameters:
      orderDTO - the order whose status has to be changed
      Returns:
      the order with a new status
      Throws:
      Exception - if the order details are invalid or the DB couldn't be accessed
